publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-643 Donald Gorrie: Official Opening of RECAP Recycling Project in Cumbernauld-That the Parliament congratulates the management and staff of the RECAP recycling project in Cumbernauld on its formal opening on 28 November 2003; welcomes the role it will play in providing affordable access to recycled furniture and white goods for disadvantaged sectors of communities across North Lanarkshire; commends the initiative of Cumbernauld Unemployed Workers Centre in establishing the project, and welcomes the positive contribution that RECAP will make to North Lanarkshire's recycling efforts.
S2M-643 Official Opening of RECAP Recycling Project in Cumbernauld (lodged on 21 November 2003) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-643 Official Opening of RECAP Recycling Project in Cumbernauld (lodged on 21 November 2003) Michael Matheson*
S2M-643 Official Opening of RECAP Recycling Project in Cumbernauld (lodged on 21 November 2003) Elaine Smith*
S2M-643 Official Opening of RECAP Recycling Project in Cumbernauld (lodged on 21 November 2003) Linda Fabiani*
